title: Introducing: Novella
body:
It might be wishful thinking, but it sounds like the haze that’s covered one hell of a lot of musical releases over the last few years might be lifting.

Underneath that cloying pall we can find the likes of London/Brighton quartet **Novella**, three girls and one boy making a stargazing grungy racket, exemplified by the likes of _Don’t Believe Ayn Rand_, lead track from their forthcoming EP. _…Ayn Rand_ showcases a distinct step forward from the band’s previous releases, sharpening their fidgety beats and roiling distortion, and adding a hook so big it has its own gravitational pull. It’s effortlessly cool, but it’s still kind of approachable.

Novella are due to release their eponymous EP via [Italian Beach Babes](http://italianbeachbabes.bigcartel.com/product/ibb018-novella-ep "BURNING SKULL RECORDS") on March 19th. You can find the dates for their March tour with Veronica Falls below. You can also keep track of them on their [website](http://www.novellaband.com/ "Nah jus' kiddin' man, s'Tumblr innit?!").

[Don’t Believe Ayn Rand](http://soundcloud.com/novellanovella/dont-believe-ayn-rand) by [Novella.](http://soundcloud.com/novellanovella)
